subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After playing a role in allowing the Pittsburgh Pirates’ final three runs in their 8-4 victory against the Mets, Joe Smith was optioned to Class AAA New Orleans, the first demotion of his professional career.
snippet: After playing a role in allowing the Pittsburgh Pirates’ final three runs in their 8-4 victory against the Mets, Joe Smith was optioned to Class AAA New Orleans, the first demotion of his professional career.
